Remember that? And all those people that welcome the "refugees" said we were all just big ol' heartless mean racists and xenophobes. That will never happen, right? Just racist paranoia! I remember seeing pictures of young European women holding signs that said "We welcome refugees!". Well, you people made your bed...many of us citizens tried to warn you before this, before the Paris attacks. People tried to warn you that many of these refugees were not helpless little toddlers but grown men posing as asylum seekers to invade your countries. Now they are here. Good luck getting them out. Thank your dear leaders like Merkel who flat out told you that your country was not for you as she welcomed foreigners and opened the gates, and then were surprised at the consequences
